There are 232 active sheds across Morningside Heights, Manhattanville, and Hamilton Heights.

Shed locations across Manhattan Community Board 9 sized according to age.

As of publication,

the longest standing

active shed in

Manhattan

Community Board 9 is

6,125 days old.

Pressed Juicery’s

location off of

Cathedral Parkway

and Broadway.

Source: New York City Department of Buildings

Graphic by Franco Magalhaes
